name: QuDiffuse
description: This project explores the use of D-Wave’s quantum annealing to improve the efficiency of diffusion models, aiming to reduce generation time while maintaining high quality data samples.

name: Machine Learning in RNA Folding Predictions
description: Using machine learning to predict RNA folding, this project aims to develop a generative model that maps a given RNA sequence to its 3D molecular structure while optimizing computational energy efficiency.

name: Deep Emotion
description: This project uses contrastive learning on fMRI brain scans to identify which movie scenes a person is viewing. The goal is to align brain activity with visual stimuli using deep learning techniques.

name: Flow to Learn
description: This project applies flow matching techniques to neural network parameters, leveraging mixture learning and model weight merging strategies to predict and transfer weights between models.

name: AI ChatBot
description: This AI chatbot answers student inquiries and promotes UTMIST events across Discord and other platforms. It aims to streamline student-club communication with a smart conversational interface.

name: AI Warehouse
description: UTMIST is collaborating with AI Warehouse to build an evolution simulation in Unity using C# and genetic algorithms for educational videos reaching millions of viewers.

name: Lovelytics
description: Partnering with Lovelytics, this project extends a LangChain-powered LLM automation tool for business workflows, focusing on task generation via natural language prompts on Azure Databricks.

name: Aercoustics
description: This collaboration with Aercoustics focuses on classifying sound events from construction sites using acoustic data, aiding in compliance and environmental monitoring.

name: Aemulus VR
description: Aemulus VR is using neural rendering and Gaussian Splatting to create photorealistic 3D e-commerce displays for luxury products, transforming online shopping experiences.

name: KnockRI
description: Knockri uses AI to evaluate candidates through video, audio, and text, reducing hiring bias by focusing on competencies instead of resumes in order to promote fair recruitment practices.

name: ML Compute Platform Project
description: This system dynamically manages UTMIST’s cloud-based ML workloads. It handles MLOps workflows, allocates compute resources, logs performance, and provides real-time monitoring across cloud providers.

name: ML Project Platform
description: A centralized hub to manage the ML project lifecycle, including task tracking, team collaboration, milestone monitoring, and code/resource sharing for ongoing and past projects.

name: ECG Analysis Using Deep CNNs
description: Applying deep convolutional neural networks to analyze ECG data for cardiovascular disease detection.

name: Employee Attrition Factors Prediction
description: Utilizing machine learning to identify and address factors contributing to employee attrition.

name: Real Estate Price Prediction
description: Developing a real-time model to predict real estate prices using machine learning techniques.

name: SmileDetector
description: Creating a web application that employs machine learning to detect and rate smiles.

name: WallStreetBots
description: Implementing NLP and reinforcement learning for stock price prediction and market analysis.

name: Handwriting Recognition Using Deep Learning
description: Applying deep learning techniques to recognize handwritten text in physical documents.

name: DiffMuse
description: Exploring music synthesis using diffusion models to generate new compositions.

name: Numerai Quant Team
description: Developing models to compete on Numerai's weekly hedge fund prediction challenges.

name: VirtualCreatures
description: Reimagining Karl Sims' 1994 'Evolving Virtual Creatures' paper using modern techniques.

name: 12-Lead ECG Reconstruction
description: Reconstructing full 12-lead ECG signals from only 2-3 lead inputs using ML models.

name: AltaML
description: Building an ML pipeline tailored for applications in the construction industry.

name: FashionBot
description: Developing a customizable fashion recommendation system using machine learning.

name: Omni
description: Integrating information retrieval into the creative process through ML techniques.

name: Osu!
description: Generating Osu! beatmaps using sequence-to-sequence models for rhythm game enthusiasts.

name: PhotoML - Startup Collaboration
description: Applying machine learning to enhance picture selection processes.

name: RealTime2
description: Advancing the RealTime project from 2021 with new features and improvements.

name: WallStreetBots2
description: Continuing the WallStreetBots project with a focus on cryptocurrency price prediction.

name: Wind Turbine Audibility
description: Providing an ML solution for the turbine audibility problem in collaboration with Aercoustics Ltd.

name: Side Channel Attacks
description: Crack the AES cryptosystem via side channel attacks using deep learning (ResNet, LSTM, Transformer). The project involves hardware-level data collection and attack modeling.

name: Auto-Colorization of Historical Black and White Images
description: Re-implement and improve CNN-based automatic image colorization using GMMs and a specialized architecture, building on the 'Colorful Image Colorization' paper.

name: Denoising Renderings using Deep Learning
description: Build a Monte Carlo renderer with deep learning denoising and a real-time GUI viewer. The goal is to improve CGI quality and efficiency.

name: EMILI
description: Construct a dynamic pipeline to collect domain-specific datasets and train LLMs. The project involves web crawling, relevance filtering, and dataset-feedback loops.

name: Virtual Creatures II
description: Use NEAT and multi-agent RL to evolve and train virtual creatures in Unity, building on last year's successful evolution of walkers and swimmers.

name: Is Hashing All You Need For Implicit Neural Representations?
description: Explore why multi-resolution hash embeddings outperform other methods in INRs. Conduct experiments and possibly submit to ICML/NeurIPS 2024.

name: QuSparse - Quantum Approaches to Sparse Signal Reconstruction
description: Use quantum algorithms like QFT to improve sparse signal reconstruction, transforming signals into quantum states and reconstructing using QML.

name: NucleAIse
description: Predict protein functions and Gene Ontologies using LLMs (Transformers), GNNs, and CNNs. The project aims to identify key model features and improve biological insights for drug discovery.

name: Real-Time Trading with Sequence Models and RL
description: Develop a deep RL-based real-time trading agent for FX and commodities. Design a custom RL environment and agent leveraging sequence models and DRL techniques.

name: Spiking Neural Networks with Memristor Hardware
description: Build neuromorphic computing systems using Spiking Neural Networks (SNNs) and memristor-based hardware. Split into software and hardware teams for training and circuit fabrication.
